passiveSkills.name: Spirit of Determination
passiveSkills.desc: Increases Attack when HP is less than 50%. Increases even further when HP is less than 25%.

advancedSkills.name: Vertical Square
advancedSkills.desc: Unleashes a shockwave in the surrounding area after a swift combo.

advancedSkills.name: Devil's Judgment
advancedSkills.desc: A furious combo that deals Dark damage. Applies a temporary debuff, preventing you from recovering more than your current HP at the time of casting.

advancedSkills.name: Vorpal Strike
advancedSkills.desc: Take aim and release a high-speed lunging thrust. Hold to build up power and deal greater damage.

advancedSkills.name: Mother's Rosario
advancedSkills.desc: Unleash a series of rapid strikes in a cross formation. The final blow deals massive damage.

advancedSkills.name: Heavy Attack
advancedSkills.desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Sharp Tornado, a rising slash.

advancedSkills.name: Heavy Attack
advancedSkills.desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Sharp Tornado, a rising slash.
